data.message: Where do I express being irritated that I had to install a messenger app on my phone to keep getting FB messages there?

replies.message: Hi Matthew. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/XJPmRk. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community and will pass your note along to our team. -Jenny
Hey Facebook care to weigh in? http://thebull.cbslocal.com/2014/08/07/facebook-crosses-the-line-with-new-facebook-messenger-app/#.U-PSsFEGajg.facebook
FB, My messenger experience would be better if I didn't have to install another App,
I usually don't complain about Facebook, but I am NOT Going to instal a separate app to access messages. #FacebookFail
Nope, it's stupid. Nothing wrong with how it was.
They have access to wayyyyy to much personal info
I agree. I was forced to install this app or I won't get my messages. WHAT ?? This ding is driving me crazy. Can't turn off the sound. What's up with this app. It was fine the way it was.
I refuse to install a separate app.  There is enough memory used up on my phone as is.   Bad idea.
Install it and delete it.  It doesn't bug you anymore.
Lisa! thank you so much~!!! it works! i get my messages back as soon as i deleted the app!
A separate messaging app is a horrible idea and should not require access to my phone and contacts to work.
Even when you delete it it's still on your cloud and can still access information because you agreed to those terms

Also. Who the hell cares if you're going to be able to respond faster. Lame excuse I think. If you even have a life. They will respond when available. And you can just wait for them to respond how's that sound.
PLEASE INCORPORATE THE MESSENGER INTO A SINGULAR APP AND STREAMLINE RAM USAGE!!! Thank you...
The app is a violation if numerous privacy laws!
It sucks!! I hate it!!!
Read the fine print people!!!! You are being had!!! Facebook, you should be ashamed of this outrageous privacy overreach!!!
@Lindsey Templeton - how do you remove it from the cloud??
Total invasion of privacy, and the terms of service aren't stated clearly, especially when they MAKE you download it to receive messages. Bull$hit
I agree! I refuse to install that stupid messenger app! Stop changing everything!!
ขำรายยะ๊
http://thebull.cbslocal.com/2014/08/07/facebook-crosses-the-line-with-new-facebook-messenger-app/#.U-QbO1dLZnw.facebook
I hate it and feel like I'm being virtually taken against my will.  It's more then an app, it's like some futuristic control program with too much access.
Deactivate your accounts. On to google+
Time to go back to myspace. Screw Facebook and their bullying.
